amendment.description: Amendment reduces by $2 million the appropriation for State unemployment insurance and service operations, increases by $4 million the appropriation for Department of Labor departmental management, reduces the Health Care Financing Administration program management appropriation by $2.29 million, and increases the appropriation for children and families services programs by $1.3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order by the rule and printed as amendment No. 1-1 in House Rept. 104-224 to make certain technical corrections to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
